title: When will rank reset?
body:
Hi All, I don't know if im the only one but it seems pretty annoying that any ranking up I do at the moment 1. will just be reset eventually and 2. Wont count to a border or anything. Just wondering if you guys have any idea when the rank will reset so I know when to probably start playing ranked again?

Many Thanks

replies.body: Your rank won't matter anymore but winning games in ranked will still increase your MMR which will place you higher when you do your provisional games next season.
So is there really any point to playing ranked right now?

Yes. The reset is soft so you lose your rank but it will mostly retain your MMR. Pre-season ranked MMR improvements will help out with placement matches. Improving your MMR now = better placement matches in January
Oh great, so this game will be utter cancer for the next 3 months or so. How lovely. Thanks Tencent/Riot.
Late January/Early February is usually when the next season starts, could be earlier/later also
